item.description: We are going to the Roslindale Open Mike! The sign-ups start at 6pm and the show starts at 7 pm. There is no charge, but there is a donation basket which goes to the feature of the night, which will be Michael Troy.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me at 857.492.6020 or look around for me with my small tan guitar case.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Open Mic!
